external_games.name: King's Bounty: Legions | True Tactician Ultimate Pack

name: King's Bounty: Legions - True Tactician Ultimate Pack
summary: A balanced starter pack for King's Bounty: Legions players. Take command of a squad of powerful creatures, enjoy fine artifacts and Royal Aura for 30 days -- and all at a discount! This pack was gathered based on recommendations from the top King's Bounty: Legions players. It contains units that go best together.
